2024.question: According to Strahlerâ€™s stream ordering system, what is the highest order of stream in the given diagram?

A tunnel with vertical walls and arched crown is constructed through a set of sedimentary beds. The thickness of individual beds is significantly less than the wall-height of the tunnel. For which of the following conditions, one of the tunnel walls becomes unstable?
options: The tunnel axis is horizontal and the beds are horizontal
The tunnel axis is parallel to the strike of beds and the beds dip 45â° â€“ 60â°
The tunnel axis is parallel to the strike of beds and the beds are vertical
The tunnel axis is perpendicular to the strike of beds and the beds are vertical
2024.answer: The tunnel axis is parallel to the strike of beds and the beds dip 45â° â€“ 60â°

2024.question: A plunging fold will NOT show a V-shaped outcrop pattern on a planar ground surface if the plunge of the fold axis is
options: equal to the dip of the ground surface in the same direction
steeper than the dip of the ground surface in the same direction
equal to the dip of the ground surface in the opposite direction
steeper than the dip of the ground surface in the opposite direction
2024.answer: equal to the dip of the ground surface in the same direction

2024.question: The given map shows the outcrop patterns of beds (1 â€“ 4) across a fault plane, F â€“ Fâ€™, on a flat ground. X and Y refer to the two blocks across F â€“ Fâ€™. Which one of the following options is the correct interpretation of the structure depicted on the map?
options: A south-easterly plunging synform that was subsequently faulted with block X upthrown
A north-westerly plunging antiform that was subsequently faulted with block Y upthrown
A south-easterly plunging antiform that was subsequently faulted with block X downthrown
A north-westerly plunging synform that was subsequently faulted with block Y downthrown
2024.answer: A south-easterly plunging antiform that was subsequently faulted with block X upthrown

2024.question: The crystal form 'dome' contains

two non-parallel faces related by a 2-fold axis of symmetry

2024.answer: two non-parallel faces related by a mirror plane
